record.title: ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, MAY 8, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, MAY 8, 2008 -- (Senate - May 07, 2008)

[Page: S3931]

speaking.paragraph:
Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 9:30 a.m. tomorrow, Thursday, May 8; that following the prayer and the pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed to have expired, the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day; that there be a period of morning business for up to 1 hour, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 
[Page:  S3932]

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
